input.sentences: my friend and i visited a city in location | and enjoyed dinner there .
then we went for a walk to see the sites | including this traditional temple .
we walked through the gates and headed through town .
at the shore | my friend had her picture taken by the water .

output.sentences: We started our vacation day with a traditional breakfast which included miso soup.
The temples we saw were colorful.
The height of one temple entrance way was particularly impressive.
Our vacation included a trip to the beach.
We were thrilled to find shells on our walk along the shoreline.
